detail_desc: Lace bralette with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Double, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hobo bag in imitation suede with an imitation leather handle, zip at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 31x36 cm.
Straight-style top in jersey crêpe with a gathered stand-up collar and small opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long, slightly wider, cuffed sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretchy denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs with raw-edge hems. Slim fit.
Suit trousers in twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a press-stud.
Jersey vest top in a burnout-patterned cotton blend with visible seams and a raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on the shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Skirt in a patterned viscose weave with side pockets and frill-trimmed, gathered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Spacious shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Soft brushed inside. Size 16x31x39 cm.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Blouse in a crinkled weave with lace trims and flutter sleeves. Round neck with a scalloped, crocheted trim and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Unlined.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a round, gathered neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length raglan balloon sleeves with narrow trims, and a gathered flounce at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Nylon jacket with a zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and one inner pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Fine-knit lining.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.

Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton twill with a turn-down collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and a yoke with a loop at the back.
Block-coloured jacket in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar and a contrasting colour zip down the front. Concealed pockets in the side seams and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with front pockets and straps that cross and fasten at the back.
Metal studs in various designs. Size from 0.8 cm to 1.6 cm.
Thigh boots in soft leather with decorative seams, covered heels, and a zip on the inside at the bottom of the shaft. Satin linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and jacquard-patterned details. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Treggings in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Sleeveless nursing top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a double layer at the top and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Water bottle in patterned hard plastic with a non-drip lid and detachable loop. Capacity 750 ml.
Imitation leather sandals. Foot straps with adjustable fasteners and a hook and loop fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey with embroidered text on the front.
Wide-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying mesh. Racer back with a cut-out section and narrow elastication at the hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.

Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket and front and back pockets. Press-studs at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Mules in imitation leather with square toes, narrow, patent straps and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Zipped side pockets, a zip at the cuffs and a tab and decorative press-stud at the sides. Recycled polyester lining.
Long, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with a fold-down shaft that has a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Wide trousers in a jacquard weave with a high waist with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Shoulder tabs, a diagonal zip at the front, a fake zipped pocket and fake flap pocket with a press-stud at the front. Lined.
Jersey top with elastication at the top and short, wide, raglan sleeves with broderie anglaise.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Knee-length shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Shirt in an airy, slub cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with a tab and button, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Necklace with three metal chains in different lengths, one with a drop-shaped pendant and one with a bar-shaped pendant. Adjustable length.
Metal rings in various designs, one decorated with rhinestones.
Non-padded, underwired bra in lace and mesh with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in jersey made from a viscose blend with a motif on the front.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print, stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved bodysuit in an organic cotton weave with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Ties at one side.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sides. Soft brushed inside.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Short, pattern-weave trenchcoat with notch lapels, a loose yoke with a pleat at the back, tie belt at the waist and side pockets. Partly lined.
Dress in a patterned modal crêpe weave with a seam at the waist, decorative bow at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, opening with a button at the back of the neck and soft belt with D-rings at the waist. Concealed pockets in the side seams, a low crotch and wide, straight legs. Lined.

Oversized, calf-length jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Lined hood with an elastic drawstring and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Front pockets, an inner pocket, and concealed press-studs at the sides of the hem that can be unfastened to create a vent. Lined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short skirt in a soft weave with a high waist and sewn-in belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets, pleats front and back and a concealed zip and button at the back.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short skirt in jersey with shimmering details with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.

Short dress in an airy weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front. Short puff sleeves with smocking and frill trims, and flounced trims down the front and around the hem. Jersey lining.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, slits in the sides and hard-worn details at the hem. Longer at the back.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather with covered heels, narrow foot straps and a narrow, double ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 7 cm.
Oversized T-shirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Small purse in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a tab and press-stud. Ten compartments: one with a zip, six card slots and three slightly larger ones. Size 1.5x9x13 cm.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Soft faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Glittery Alice band with a rainbow, sunburst and cloud on top.
